pages.title: Linear Regression - A Mathematical Introduction
pages.text: Following in the tradition of the books Effective Java and Effective C++, we now have one for Python too. Effective Python is a book I wished that had been available long ago. The book has ten chapters each dealing with different aspects of Python. The organization is neat and effective. 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 # import required packages from sklearn.regression import LinearRegressor import pandas as pd import numpy as np # read in data data = pd . read_csv ( 'train.csv' )

pages.title: Effective Python - A Quick Review
pages.text: Following in the tradition of the books Effective Java and Effective C++, we now have one for Python too. Effective Python is a book I wished that had been available long ago. The book has ten chapters each dealing with different aspects of Python. The organization is neat and effective.
